personal.name: Unuane Godspower Ozimede
personal.title: Senior DevOps Engineer & Cloud Infrastructure Leader
personal.bio: Visionary DevOps and Cloud Infrastructure Leader with experience architecting scalable, secure, and cost-efficient cloud solutions across fintech, e-commerce, and enterprise platforms. Proven track record of leading distributed teams, designing resilient CI/CD workflows, and implementing governance models to support compliance and security standards (PCI DSS, ISO 27001).
personal.summary: Adept at multi-cloud deployments (Azure, AWS, Huawei, GCP), cloud cost control, container orchestration, and developer productivity enablement. Known for driving organizational transformation through Infrastructure as Code (IaC), DevSecOps practices, and high-impact automation initiatives.

experience.description: Leading cloud infrastructure architecture and operations for mission-critical payment gateways and instant payment solutions across multi-cloud environments.
achievements: Architected and operationalized cloud infrastructure across Azure, GCP, and Huawei Cloud for mission-critical payment gateways
Implemented cloud cost controls including autoscaling and reserved instance planning, resulting in >30% reduction in monthly spend
Led infrastructure strategy for PCI DSS-aligned environments with IaC and version-controlled pipelines
Reduced incident recovery time by 60% through alerting, dashboards, and runbooks
Managed technical onboarding and mentorship of junior DevOps staff

experience.description: Leading full lifecycle infrastructure delivery and GitOps practices for scalable microservices architecture.
achievements: Led full lifecycle infrastructure delivery using Terraform and Kubernetes on Huawei Cloud and Azure
Designed and enforced GitOps practices using Argo CD and GitHub Actions for zero-downtime updates
Integrated CI/CD security gates and scanning tools into release pipelines
Implemented observability stack using Prometheus, Grafana, and Loki with SLO-driven monitoring
Implemented Zero Trust architecture and Web Application Firewall using Cloudflare

experience.description: Led infrastructure automation strategy and deployment architecture for fast-paced product releases.
achievements: Led infrastructure automation strategy using Terraform and Ansible
Orchestrated deployment architecture on AWS ECS with integrated code quality tools
Strengthened cloud network security with tiered VPC design and IAM policy governance
Implemented automated security testing (SAST and DAST) for vulnerability detection
Integrated SonarQube and Jenkins into the development lifecycle

experience.description: Drove cost optimization and security compliance while automating deployment pipelines and infrastructure management.
achievements: Drove 25% reduction in operating costs through spot instances and schedule-based shutdown policies
Automated deployment pipelines and secret rotation using Ansible, Terraform, and Vault
Enforced RBAC and IAM access policies aligning with ISO 27001 and SOC 2 recommendations
Integrated Kafka for messaging and event-driven microservice communication
Deployed Ansible playbooks for secure VM patching and consistent OS-level configurations

experience.description: Designed Azure infrastructure strategy for enhanced reliability and scalability of educational technology platforms.
achievements: Designed Azure infrastructure strategy enhancing reliability and scalability of edtech platforms
Secured build artifacts and sensitive data through Azure Key Vault and Fortanix encryption tools
Collaborated across development and QA teams to release resilient applications on schedule
Implemented automated security testing (SAST and DAST) and Zero Trust architecture
Configured secure cloud VPN connections for third-party integrations

projects.title: GCP Portfolio Project
projects.description: Comprehensive Google Cloud Platform portfolio showcasing cloud infrastructure, DevOps practices, and scalable application deployment.
projects.longDescription: A complete GCP-based portfolio project demonstrating cloud-native architecture, infrastructure as code, CI/CD pipelines, and modern DevOps practices. Features automated deployment, monitoring, and security best practices on Google Cloud Platform.

projects.title: AWS ECS Portfolio Infrastructure
projects.description: Production-ready AWS ECS infrastructure deployment using Terraform with modular architecture and automated provisioning.
projects.longDescription: Complete Infrastructure as Code solution for AWS ECS deployment featuring modular Terraform architecture, automated database setup, and secure access management. Includes comprehensive shell scripts for installation, database creation, and access configuration, demonstrating enterprise-grade AWS infrastructure management.

projects.title: Azure Multi-Tier Insurance Platform
projects.description: A comprehensive Azure infrastructure deployment using Terraform that implements a secure, scalable multi-tier architecture for an insurance platform.
projects.longDescription: Production-ready Azure infrastructure following best practices with hub-and-spoke network topology, private AKS clusters, and environment-specific configurations. Features Application Gateway with AGIC, PostgreSQL Flexible Server, Azure Key Vault, Blob Storage, and Workload Identity for secure pod-to-Azure resource authentication. Includes both production and staging environments with auto-scaling capabilities.

projects.title: Huawei Cloud Container Engine (CCE) Migration
projects.description: Production workload migration from GCP GKE to Huawei Cloud CCE with zero-downtime deployment and automated rollback capabilities.
projects.longDescription: Successfully migrated enterprise applications from Google Kubernetes Engine to Huawei Cloud Container Engine, implementing blue-green deployment strategies, automated database migration scripts, and comprehensive monitoring solutions. Features Terraform infrastructure provisioning, Helm chart management, and CI/CD pipeline integration with Huawei DevCloud.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.content: Godspower's expertise in multi-cloud architecture and DevOps transformation has been instrumental in our infrastructure modernization. His ability to reduce costs while improving security and reliability is exceptional.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.content: Working with Godspower has been transformative for our team. His leadership in implementing GitOps practices and observability solutions has significantly improved our deployment confidence and system reliability.

testimonials.name: Adebayo Ogundimu
testimonials.content: Godspower's cost optimization strategies and security implementations helped us achieve compliance standards while reducing operational expenses by 25%. His mentorship of junior team members is equally impressive.
